keywords_explanation_array: "SONAR (SOund Navigation And Ranging) is a technique that uses sound waves in the detection and location of objects.","Active sonar involves both the transmission of sound pulses and receiving the echo of the sent sound.","Passive sonar involves listening to the sounds given off by targets.","A repetition of sound produced by the reflection of sound waves from an obstructing surface.","Sequence of longitudinal waves of pressure that propagates sound through compressible media such as air or water. "
